otherNames: Mo Dao Zu Shi: Wanjie Pian, Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation 3, The Founder of Diabolism 3,  魔道祖师 3, Mo Dao Zu Shi Final Arc, 魔道祖师 完结篇
synopsis: The third and final season of Mo Dao Zu Shi that covers the Yi City Arc. The story follows the two main characters Wei Wuxian and Lan Wangji as they try to finish solving the mystery behind the haunted arm of an unknown corpse.
